faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform

setup.question: How long does it take to set up the system?
setup.answer: The basic setup can be completed in 1-2 days, depending on the size of your farm and number of sensors. Our team provides comprehensive installation guides and support throughout the process.

technical.question: Do I need technical knowledge to use the platform?
technical.answer: No, our platform is designed to be user-friendly and intuitive. You don't need technical expertise to monitor your farm or make basic adjustments to your irrigation system.

trial.question: Can I try before I buy?
trial.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial that includes access to most features. You can also request a personalized demo from our team.

sensors.question: What type of sensors are compatible with your system?
sensors.answer: Our system is compatible with a wide range of agricultural IoT sensors, including soil moisture sensors, temperature sensors, humidity sensors, and more. We provide our own sensors but can also integrate with selected third-party devices.

connectivity.question: Do I need internet connectivity in my fields?
connectivity.answer: Your sensors need to be able to transmit data to our platform, which typically requires some form of connectivity. This can be through cellular networks, LoRaWAN, or WiFi connections depending on your farm's setup.

accuracy.question: How accurate are the sensors?
accuracy.answer: Our sensors provide industry-leading accuracy with error margins typically less than 2% for moisture readings and ±0.5°C for temperature readings. All sensors are calibrated before shipping.

contracts.question: Are there any long-term contracts?
contracts.answer: We offer both monthly and annual billing options. Annual plans come with a 10% discount, but there are no long-term contracts required - you can cancel your subscription at any time.

updates.question: Are software updates included in the subscription?
updates.answer: Yes, all software updates and platform improvements are included in your subscription at no additional cost.

setup.question: Is there a setup fee?
setup.answer: There's no setup fee for our software platform. However, for Enterprise customers requiring custom integration or on-site installation support, additional service fees may apply.
